description: Try our easy to follow Cocoa, Orange & Pecan Flapjacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cocoa, Orange & Pecan Flapjacks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease an 18 cm (7 inch) square tin.
In a large saucepan melt together the coconut oil, molasses, sugar and agave syrup, until the sugar has dissolved.
Stir in the remaining ingredients and mix well.
Pour into the prepared tin and level the top.
Bake in a preheated oven, 180°C, Gas Mark 4, for 18-20 minutes, then remove from the oven and cut into 12 squares. Leave to cool in the tin.
